name: Torta-fix®
description: Torta-fix® is a whipping concentrate for the safe production of biscuit and sand masses. It is tailored to the raw materials commonly used in baking: wheat flour type 550,granulated sugar KF and shortening. It is stirred or beaten with all the ingredients in one operation to the appropriate mass. The good impact tolerance brings security and optimal volume. It can be used for all biscuit and sand masses in the all-in process
